name: Lay on Hands
description: You carry a reservoir of luminous vitality that flares to life when you lay your hand upon an injured creature. Once per rest, you may release a portion of this inner radiance to restore health, purge minor ailments, or stabilize a fading ally. The more dire the need, the brighter your spark burns—though drawing too deeply leaves you momentarily light‑headed and warm to the touch.
summary: Channel a stored reserve of life‑energy to mend wounds with a touch.
